release_notes: Major update with collaboration tools: change tracking, task management, and team chat
changelog: Change tracking system - see who made which changes (git blame-like)
Collaborative undo/redo system - team-wide undo operations
Task management - create, assign, and track tasks for team members
Team chat - text chat with link and code snippet support
Multiple scene support - create and switch between scenes
Object import system - import objects between scenes
